name: Four Winds Interactive
tag_list: digital-signage, way-finding, building-directory, hospitality, hotel, hotel-directory
overview: Four Winds Interactive, LLC provides digital signage software solutions. The company offers Four Winds Interactive iDS, a digital signage software solution that enables its users to control entire digital signage network from one central location. Its software solution consists of Content Manager, which allows its users to leverage the content in digital systems to get digital signs up and running; Content Player that displays finished content and manages the overall experience of a system; Desktop Player that displays a digital sign in a resizable window on employees’ desktops; Screen Saver, which shows a digital sign every time when PC goes into screen saver mode; and CM Express that provides access to manage signs by providing a critical functionality. The company also offers project management, signage architecture, creative, installation, training, and support services for its software solution. Its software solution is used in corporate, education, gaming and casino, hotel, conference/convention, manufacturing, healthcare and hospital, government, stadium/public places, religious/church, and financial and banking digital signage applications. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Denver, Colorado. Four Winds Interactive, LLC is a prior subsidiary of Four Winds Trading Co.
